0.1.name: wordpress/nextgen-oqey-skins-lite
0.1.description:
NextGen Oqey Skins Lite is a plugin that allow to use oQey Skins on NextGen Gallery. It process automatically the nextgen gallery tags, slideshow and nggallery running them with the default oQey skin. It work perfect with free and commercial oQey Skins.

Links:

  • Demo Gallery

For more details, skins and examples and flash gallery, please visit oqeysites.com

Features:

  • Allow to use the oqey skins for nextgen gallery
